participant_1.background:
I work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.
At night , i party hard in the atlanta club scene , and i never miss a music festival.
It is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.
I have borderline personality disorder.

participant_2.background:
I work as a plumber.
I can speak four languages fluently.
I am an award winning th member.
I volunteer in my sons boy scout troop.
I can do many celebrity impressions.

content.text: What do you do for work?
Oh, that's interesting. What do you like about it?
I like the variety of work and the ability to help people.
That's great. I'm a dental assistant.
Oh, that's cool. What do you like about it?
I like the work environment and the ability to help people with their dental needs.
That's great. I've heard that dental assistants can make a lot of money.
Yeah, we can make a decent living. What are your hobbies?
I like to play music, do impressions, and volunteer in my son's boy scout troop.
That's cool. I like to party, go to music festivals, and volunteer at the local animal shelter.
Oh, we have a lot in common. I love going to music festivals and volunteering.
Me too. I think it's important to give back to the community.
I agree. It's a great way to meet new people and make a difference.
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too. I think we'd make great friends.
I agree. We should hang out sometime.
